onboardingStartText: This app will help you track your water intake and maintain a healthy hydration balance. Letâ€™s explore how to use it together!
first-step: Here youâ€™ll see your daily water intake goal.
second-step: This is your progress indicator throughout the day.
third-step: Click here to add water to your daily intake.
fourth-step: In this section, you can enter personal details and manage your daily water tracking in the profile settings.
fifth-step: This section shows your water consumption history for the day â€” when and how much water you added.
sixth-step: Here you can view your monthly water intake statistics, with each day shown as a convenient percentage.
onboardingEndTitle: Great! Now you're ready to use WaterControl.
